actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for payment under CHAMPUS of certain health care expenses incurred by members and former members of the uniformed services and their dependents who are entitled to retired or retainer pay and who are otherwise ineligible for such payment by reason of their entitlement to benefits under title XVIII of the Social Security Act because of a disability, and for other purposes.
short_title: Military Disabled Retiree Protection Act of 1991

summary.text: Military Disabled Retiree Protection Act of 1991 - Allows payments under the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services for certain health care expenses incurred by members and former members of the uniformed services (and their dependents) who are entitled to retired or retainer pay and who are otherwise ineligible for such payments by reason of their entitlement to hospital insurance and supplementary medical insurance benefits under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act because of a disability.

titles.title: Military Disabled Retiree Protection Act of 1991

A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for payment under CHAMPUS of certain health care expenses incurred by members and former members of the uniformed services and their dependents who are entitled to retired or retainer pay and who are otherwise ineligible for such payment by reason of their entitlement to benefits under title XVIII of the Social Security Act because of a disability, and for other purposes.
